task.summary: Default task

Simplified conditional logic and streamlined method structures in `MiddlewareComponentModelContributor` and `CrossWiringComponentModelContributor` to improve readability and maintainability. Updated test class constructors to adopt more concise parameter initialization.
Added `[PublicAPI]` annotations and replaced redundant null checks with modern conditional assignment operators to improve code clarity and consistency across core files.
Refactored properties in test classes to use read-only auto-properties where applicable, improved code clarity, and resolved inspection warnings.
Removed redundant static members and unused assignments from test classes to streamline the code and improve maintainability.
Added `[UsedImplicitly]` annotations and converted several classes to `static` to improve code clarity, ensure consistency, and align with best practices across test and core files.
Refactored multiple classes to replace `public` static members with `private` fields, updated access modifiers for methods and enums, and streamlined code consistency across core and test files.

Added `[PublicAPI]` annotations to multiple methods in `WindsorServiceProviderFactoryBase`. Removed redundant virtual methods in test classes and updated property to non-virtual in `CustomerImpl` for clarity and consistency.

Removed unused method parameters from multiple interfaces, classes, and test cases to simplify method signatures and improve code clarity. Consolidated parameter-less methods for consistency and maintainability across core and test files.

Added ReSharper suppression comments for unused type parameters in interfaces and removed unused method parameters in `WindsorContainerBuilder`. Simplified method signatures and resolved inspection warnings across test and core files.

Marked unused parameters with `#pragma warning` suppressions, removed redundant method bodies, and added `[PublicAPI]` annotations to enhance code clarity and maintainability across core files and test cases.

Removed unused method parameters in `ICatalog` and `SimpleCatalog`, refactored `RemoveItem` method to align with updated interface definitions, and suppressed ReSharper warnings for unused parameters.

Removed unused properties, methods, and interfaces across test files; converted multiple interfaces to single-line declarations and adjusted property accessors to read-only where applicable to simplify and streamline code.
Added `[PublicAPI]` annotation to `GetConfigurationForChildContainers` and updated test interface properties to read-only to improve code clarity and consistency.
Made properties in test fakes private set to enforce immutability and updated access modifiers in core and test files to improve consistency and code clarity.
Removed unused classes, interfaces, and methods across test and core files to simplify codebase and improve maintainability. Added `[UsedImplicitly]` annotations where applicable.
Added `[UsedImplicitly]` annotations to properties in `CustomerImpl` to suppress ReSharper warnings and added suppressions for suspicious type conversions in `DefaultProxyFactory`.

Refactored test utils and related test cases: replaced Regex declarations with `[GeneratedRegex]`, simplified constructors with property initializers, converted methods/classes to partial where needed, and replaced redundant conditionals with modern syntax for improved readability and maintainability.
Replaced `Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId` with `Environment.CurrentManagedThreadId` in scoped lifestyle tests for improved API usage consistency.
Simplified string operations in `CustomToStringService` and adjusted `WithKeyToken` method signature in `AssemblyFilter` for improved consistency and clarity.
Replaced `Any()` with `Count == 0` for conditional checks and switched string `EndsWith` arguments to char literals across test and core files for improved performance and code clarity.
Refactored `DisposableHook` to use `LifecycleCounter` for improved readability and test reliability; updated dependent test case accordingly.

Marked multiple classes across test files as `sealed`, removed unused `InitializableDisposableComponent`, and applied `GC.SuppressFinalize` in `AbstractContainerTestCase` for improved reliability and maintainability.

Refactored test files to use `var` for container and kernel declarations, replaced explicit types in initializers with implicit type expressions, and streamlined related code for improved readability and consistency.
Made `DisposedCount` property readonly across fake disposable classes and updated `FilterByName` to be private in `AssemblyFilter` for improved encapsulation and clarity.
Replaced null check with `ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull` in `GetFullPath` method for improved null safety and simplified logic.

Removed obsolete test component classes and configurations for improved maintainability and to reduce project clutter. Added `[PublicAPI]` annotations to interfaces in `IKernel` and `IWindsorContainer` for better API clarity.
Removed obsolete test components and interfaces from `Castle.Windsor.Tests` and added `[UsedImplicitly]` annotations to several classes for improved maintainability and clarity.
Added `Debug.Assert` to ensure `FullName` is not null in test type filters for improved null safety and code reliability.
Removed obsolete installer and test component classes from the project to reduce clutter and improve maintainability.
Removed obsolete test interfaces and generic mapper class, and added `[UsedImplicitly]` annotations to specific mappers to improve maintainability and code clarity.
Removed obsolete test component implementations and interfaces, replacing them with concise definitions to reduce clutter and improve maintainability.

Marked multiple disposable and test classes as `sealed`, removed redundant constructors, replaced initializations with concise definitions, and applied `GC.SuppressFinalize` in disposable components for improved reliability and maintainability.
Updated all dependencies to latest versions.
Improved the equalities with false.
Updated possible null.

Refactored constructors to use concise definitions, replaced redundant initializations, applied `Debug.Assert` for improved null handling, and removed unnecessary checks and obsolete methods for better readability and maintainability.
Updated `HasTwoConstructors` to use optional parameter for concise definition and removed redundant constructor implementation.
Removed redundant `#if DEBUG` initializations and streamlined `RunManager` configuration for improved clarity and maintainability.
Replaced static counters with `DataRepository` in tests, updated constructors to use dependency injection, and refactored related logic for improved consistency and functionality.

Simplified interfaces and test classes by replacing method/property definitions with concise syntax, removed unused members, and applied `[UsedImplicitly]` annotations where necessary to improve code clarity and maintainability.
Simplified test classes by converting method/property definitions to concise syntax and removing unused members to enhance code maintainability and readability.

Refactored test classes and interfaces by replacing method/property definitions with concise syntax, removing unused members, and adding necessary suppressions to improve maintainability and readability.

Refactored test classes and interfaces by replacing method/property definitions with concise syntax, removing unused members, applying necessary suppressions, and adding `[UsedImplicitly]` annotations to improve code maintainability and readability.

Refactored test classes and interfaces by replacing method/property definitions with concise syntax, removing unused members, applying necessary suppressions, and addressing warnings to improve code clarity and maintainability.

Refactored test classes and interfaces by replacing method definitions with concise syntax, removing unused members, and addressing configuration changes to improve maintainability and readability.
Removed unused methods and imports across classes, added `[PublicAPI]` annotations to public members, and improved code maintainability by simplifying configurations and refactoring.

Refactored test classes by replacing property definitions with concise syntax, adding `[UsedImplicitly]` annotations, removing unused members, and applying suppressions to enhance readability and code maintainability.

Refactored test classes by replacing method/property definitions with concise syntax, removing unused members, adding suppressions, and handling warnings to enhance code maintainability and readability.
